name: Automation Design Group
tag_list: home-automation-toronto, projectors-toronto, home-theater-installation-toronto, toronto-digital-media-home-automation, cinema-in-home, home-cinema, lighting-control, remote-access, smart-lighting-control, adjust-room-light-shades, home-cinema-toronto, hom
overview:
Automation Design Group is Toronto’s custom home automation company well known for providing the most dependable top of the line automated security products, lightning controls service. The Company has years of experience in design, supply and installation of automation products for home cinema, audio/video conferencing, Intelligent lighting controls, HD satellite systems, security systems, alarms etc.

Automation Design Group mission is to ensure that all of our clients’ objectives are met in a timely and professional manner in the most cost effective manner possible. The design and installation of user-friendly, touch - screen operated control systems gives advantage of controlling and monitoring room environment, light, alarms system, camera etc.

The Smartphone Control technology that can help reduce high energy consumption in residential and commercial buildings. The Company helps consumers in making life more convenient & comfortable.

We provide design, supply and installation services for the following systems:

• Home Cinema • Multi-room audio/video • Audio conferencing • Video conferencing • Dedicated listening/presentations room • Projection and multi-media systems • Intelligent lighting controls • Automation controls - specializing in touch - screen control systems • HD satellite systems • Integration of above systems with other systems including HVAC, security, motorized devices etc.

Our Product Offerings Include

• Home Cinema • Multi-room audio/video • Audio conferencing • Video conferencing • Dedicated listening/presentations room • Projection and multi-media systems • Intelligent lighting controls • Automation controls - specializing in touch - screen control systems • Integration of above systems with other systems including HVAC, security, motorized devices etc.
